venue.name: Wachusett Mountain State Reservation Headquarters & Visitor Center

item.description:
This will be approximately 5 miles, we will go up and over Mt. Wachusett twice.  With breaks, this should take around 3 hours.  Taking the Bicentennial, High Meadow, Jack Frost and Mountain House Trails, we'll get to the summit the first time, go down Old Indian, West Side and Semuhenna Trails, ascend a short distance on the Harrington Trail to reach the summit a second time, then descend on the Pine Hill Trail back to the parking lot.

Let's be ready to hit the trail at 8:3O, so arrive earlier.

We should have sunny skies in the morning, but it will be cold; dress warm, bring snacks and water.

Cel phone #  774-261-O691

I drive a black, but currently dirty, Toyota Corolla.

group.name: Northern Central MA, Southern NH Hiking Group

item.name: Mt. Wachusett Figure 8
